purposes.name: Analytics
purposes.description: Collection and analysis of personal data to further our business goals; for example, analysis of behavior of website visitors, creation of target lists for marketing and sales, and measurement of advertising performance.
purposes.legalBasisDescription: Data subject has been provided with adequate disclosure regarding the processing

purposes.name: Essential Services
purposes.description: Collection and processing of personal data to enable functionality that is essential to providing our services, including security activities, debugging, authentication, and fraud prevention, as well as contacting you with information related to products/services you have used or purchased; we may set essential cookies or other trackers for these purposes.
purposes.legalBasisDescription: Data subject has been provided with adequate disclosure regarding the processing

purposes.name: Targeted Advertising
purposes.description: Creation and activation of advertisements based on a profile informed by the collection and analysis of behavioral and personal characteristics; we may set cookies or other trackers for this purpose.
purposes.legalBasisDescription: Data subject has been provided with adequate disclosure regarding the processing

rights.description: Right to have inaccurate personal information corrected
rights.name: Correct your data

rights.description: Right to have inaccurate personal information corrected
rights.name: Correct your data

rights.description: Right to have personal information deleted
rights.name: Delete your data

rights.description: Right to be provided with a copy of personal data
rights.name: Access your data

rights.description: Right to have personal data deleted
rights.name: Delete your data

rights.description: Right to have personal data deleted
rights.name: Delete your data

rights.description: Right to obtain personal data in a portable and readily usable format
rights.name: Port your data

rights.description: Right to obtain personal data in a portable and readily usable format
rights.name: Port your data

rights.description: Right to be provided with a copy of personal information sold, in a readily usable format allowing for portability
rights.name: Understand what data we sell

rights.description: Right to be provided with a copy of personal information collected, in a readily usable format allowing for portability
rights.name: Understand what data we collect

rights.description: Right to be provided with a copy of personal data
rights.name: Access your data

rights.description: Right to be provided with a copy of personal data (and certain other information) being processed
rights.name: Access your data

rights.description: Right to have personal data erased
rights.name: Delete your data

rights.description: Right to stop the processing of personal data, including an absolute right where the use is direct marketing
rights.name: Opt out of the processing of your data

rights.description: Right to obtain and request transfer of personal data in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format
rights.name: Port your data

rights.description: Right to have inaccurate personal data rectified or, in certain cases, completed
rights.name: Correct your data

rights.description: Right to limit the way a controller uses personal data
rights.name: Restrict the processing of your data

banner.description: Welcome To EternaCloud! We’re glad you’re here and want you to know that we respect your privacy and your right to control how we collect, use, and share your personal data. Please read our Privacy Policy to learn about our privacy practices.

description.body: Welcome! We’re glad you’re here and want you to know that we respect your privacy and your right to control how we collect, use, and share your personal data. Please read our Privacy Policy to learn about our privacy practices.
description.title: Privacy Promise

header.title: Choose how we use your personal information

header.description: We collect and use personal information--including, where applicable, your sensitive personal information--for the purposes listed below. Please indicate whether or not that's ok with you by toggling the switches below. For more information on our privacy practices, please read our internal Privacy Policy to learn about our privacy practices.
header.title: You are in full control

dsrPortalLink.description: Already submitted a request? Click here to view its status.
dsrPortalLink.title: View My Requests

header.description: Applicable privacy laws give you certain rights to our collection, use, sharing, and storage of your information, and we welcome your exercise of those rights. For more detail, please read ourPrivacy Policy.
header.title: Exercise your rights

rightForm.recaptchaFailureText: Unfortunately, we are unable to fulfill your request at this time due to suspected bot-like behavior, as indicated by our reCAPTCHA verification. If you believe this is incorrect, please try re-submitting your request.

submitted.description: We've received your request. Certain requests require identity verification. For those requests, you will receive a second email with verification instructions. Please be sure to check your email. Where required, we will not be able to proceed without your timely verification.
submitted.subtitle: Thank you!
submitted.title: Request was submitted

header.description: Let us know what you are most interested in and how you'd like us to keep in touch. Unsubscribe any time by coming back here or by clicking on the manage subscriptions link in our emails.
header.title: Your Subscriptions

unsubscribeAll.description: You’ll always receive reservation details, account security updates, and changes to program terms and conditions.
unsubscribeAll.title: Unsubscribe From All

about.description: We prioritize and respect your privacy. We are committed to transparently managing your data, using it only for necessary purposes with your explicit consent. Rigorous security measures are in place to protect your information, and we never sell or share it for marketing without your permission. Your control over your data is important to us, and we continually update our practices to align with the latest standards.
about.title: About Your Privacy

welcomeMsg.subtitle: Welcome! We’re glad you’re here and want you to know that we respect your privacy and your right to control how we collect, use, and share your personal data. Please read our Privacy Policy. to learn about our privacy practices
welcomeMsg.title: Privacy Promise
